ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc61:0.2_0: The nuns’ rules and their analysis
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc61:0.3_0: The chapter on offenses entailing confession
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc61:0.5_0: 61. The training rule on pregnant women
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc61:1.1_0: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc61:1.2_0: the nuns gave the full admission to a pregnant woman.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc61:1.3_0: As a consequence he collected almsfood.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc61:1.5_0: “Give almsfood to the Venerable. She’s carrying a heavy burden.”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc61:1.6_0: People then complained and criticized those nuns,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc61:1.7_0: “How can the nuns give the full admission to a pregnant woman?”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc61:1.8_0: Nuns heard the complaints of those people,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc61:1.9_0: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized Thullanandā,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc61:1.10_0: “How can nuns give the full admission to a pregnant woman?” ...
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc61:1.11_0: “Is it true, monks, that nuns did this?”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc61:1.15_0: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it ...” ...
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc61:1.16_0: the Buddha said, “And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule like this:
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc61:1.17.1_0: ‘If a nun gives the full admission to a pregnant woman, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc61:2.1.4_0: ... The nun who has been given the full ordination in unanimity by both Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc61:2.1.6_0: a woman with child is what is meant.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc61:2.1.9_0: If, intending to give full admission, she searches for a group, a teacher, a bowl, or a robe, or she establishes a monastic boundary, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc61:2.1.10_0: for the effort there is an act of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc61:2.1.11_0: and the last announcement is made by two announcements.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc61:2.1.12_0: When the last announcement is finished, the preceptor commits an offense entailing confession,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc61:2.1.13_0: while the group and the teacher commit an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc61:2.2.1_0: If she is pregnant, and she perceives her as such, and she gives her the full admission, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc61:2.2.2_0: If she is pregnant, but she is unsure of it, and she gives her the full admission, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc61:2.2.3_0: If she is pregnant, but she does not perceive her as such, and she gives her the full admission, there is no offense.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc61:2.2.4_0: If she is not pregnant, but she perceives her as such, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc61:2.2.5_0: If she is not pregnant, but she is unsure of it, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc61:2.2.6_0: If she is not pregnant, and she does not perceive her as such, there is no offense.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc61:2.3.2_0: if she is pregnant, but she does not perceive her as such, and she gives her the full admission;
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc61:2.3.3_0: if she is not pregnant, and she does not perceive her as such, and she gives her the full admission;
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc61:2.3.5_0: if she is the first offender.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc61:2.3.6_0: The first rule, the training rule on fire, is finished.
